nodes.text: A Flood droid was a large droid with four arms built around a central unit. Following the Battle of Hoth, the Aqualish landlord Furlac used one of these droids to block the entrance of the Freemakers' garage on the Wheel space station after they defaulted on their rent payment. He withdrew the droid after Kordi Freemaker offered to pay up the rent within a day.
